vulnerable_code: checkClientTrusted() and checkServerTrusted() methods are not properly validating the X509Certificates.
description: The implementation of X509TrustManager in the D3 class is not properly validating the X509Certificates, which can lead to vulnerabilities such as man-in-the-middle attacks.
recommendation: Implement proper certificate validation in the checkClientTrusted() and checkServerTrusted() methods, such as checking the certificate's validity period, issuer, and subject, and verifying the certificate's signature.
